title: Forums Level Isn't Updating
body: Just started playing a few days ago--as of my last match I'm a solid third of the way through Level 9, maining Xayah and Nasus for the time being. (Seriously. Xayah. Holy crap. So much fun.) Anyway, my level on the forums isn't updating. I Googled it, and I think creating a discussion here should help synchronize the forums with the game itself.

replies.body: Welcome to League, I'm happy to hear you've been having fun and kicking butt with Xayah!  :D  You're right that a discussion here could help sync you up, which an account may need to do when first posting.  Enjoy yourself out there!
